metadata.title: CVE-2023-6213 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 119. Some of these bugs showedevidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort someof these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 120.

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
